measure.CatchLine: Appropriates moneys to the Oregon Business Development Department to provide grants to specified cities to build infrastructure that will contribute to the development of housing under the program established by a 2024 Act.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Digest: This Act gives money to OBDD to give grants to cities for infrastructure projects that will contribute to building more homes. (Flesch Readability Score: 64.6). 
	Appropriates moneys to the Oregon Business Development Department to provide grants to specified cities to build infrastructure that will contribute to the development of housing under the program established by a 2024 Act. Extends sunsets for the program and for cities' reports on the program. 
	Declares an emergency, effective July 1, 2025.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to housing; creating new provisions; amending sections 3 and 4, chapter 103, Oregon Laws 2024; and declaring an emergency.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to housing; declaring an emergency.
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
Referred to Housing and Homelessness with subsequent referral to Ways and Means.
